Trade/Device Name(s): Assure Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Assure Pro Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Assure Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood for home use by persons with diabetes or in clinical settings by healthcare professionals to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control
